Plot: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.
Title: Do the Right Thing
Actors: Danny Aiello, Ossie Davis, Ruby Dee, Richard Edson
tomatoConsensus: Smart, vibrant, and urgent without being didactic, Do the Right Thing is one of Spike Lee's most fully realized efforts -- and one of the most important films of the 1980s.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 11 nominations.
